wm-license-cc-free-to-share-text: kupiá pirí, umeẽ açui umurú kuá munhãgawa
wm-license-cc-conditions-attribution-tex: Ĩdé rerikú remeẽ waá kredito apropriawa, umeẽ yepé link mutarawa kití açui umupika sinimuka'etá ramẽ tausó umunhã'ana. Ĩdé remurú remunhã yawá yepé rapé tekôwara, mari nemairamẽ remunhã yepé rapé rupí umeẽ waá mira'etá taumaité mutarawaçara umuçeé ĩdé ã nepuruçawa.
wm-license-cc-conditions-share_alike-tex: Ĩdé amũmix ramẽ, umuyumunhã ã umunhã materiawa reçé, ĩdé rerikú waá remururú ne pitimũgawa'etá [https://creativecommons.org/share-your-work/licensing-considerations/compatible-licenses mutarawa yawé ã yumẽ] rupí mayé yupirũwara.
